roleset.name: to work together
roleset.note: COLLABORATE-V NOTES: Based on WSJ; nominal 'collaboration' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls correspond-36.1, conspire-71, cooperate-73-1. (from collaborate.01-v)
COLLABORATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from collaboration.01-n)
COLLABORATING-N NOTES: Based on temprel sentences. No VN class. Comparison to collaborate-v. Framed by Katie (from collaborating.01-n)

example.name: collaborate-v: two arguments
example.text: Du Pont Co. , Hewlett-Packard Co. and Los Alamos National Laboratory said they-1 signed a three-year , $ 11 million [*U*] agreement [*]-1 to collaborate on superconductor research .

example.name: collaborate-v: all arguments
example.text: Already two major pharmaceutical companies , the Squibb unit of Bristol-Myers Squibb Co. and Hoffmann-La Roche Inc. , are collaborating with gene hunters [*-1] to turn the anticipated cascade of discoveries into predictive tests and , maybe , new therapies .
example.arg: two major pharmaceutical companies , the Squibb unit of Bristol-Myers Squibb Co. and Hoffmann-La Roche Inc. ,
[*-1] to turn the anticipated cascade of discoveries into predictive tests and , maybe , new therapies

example.name: collaborate-v: all arguments with prepositional Arg2
example.text: Also Jonathan Silvers , who-1 [*T*-1] collaborated with Mr. Hoffman on two books .

example.name: collaboration-n
example.text: Meanwhile , the economic integration and military collaboration within the Shanghai Cooperation Organization has also made considerable progress .

example.name: collaboration-n: args 0, 2
example.text: We say that the full range of collaboration among the members of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization in the affairs of Central Asia , South Asia , and the Middle East will be the most favorable conditions and tools to fight the Western forces .
example.arg: among members of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization
in the affairs of Central Asia, South Asia, and the Middle East

example.name: collaborating-n: Args 0 and 1
example.text: My collaborating with Dr. James will advance his case and guide his plan.
